item.description:
This event is for advanced speakers.

The number of seats is very limited because the cafe is very popular and also to keep our group more intimate. If the weather is nice we will walk to the beautiful nearby park. 


Learn who else went last time and discover what everybodies saying.

Five stars and lot's and lot's of people: 

http://www.meetup.com/bostonspanish/events/16475347/

 

thank you for clicking and see you there!

Josh

 

P.S. I am also the organizer of The Boston Volunteer Meetup. 

More than three thousand volunteers. Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the HUGE group of Spanish speakers standing next to the door
item.why: We will be making new Spanish speaking friends and enjoying the beautiful park near Coolidge Corner. The number of seats is very limited to keep our group more intimate.

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Español en el parque? Quién mas...
